title: Desktop Voice Assistant
description: A voice-controlled desktop assistant built using Django and OpenAI Whisper model, enabling hands-free control over basic desktop functions like launching apps and reading notifications.

title: HR Automation Bot
description: A web application that simulates common HR operations such as answering queries, manage payrolls and leave approval using AI.

title: Ecommerce Web App
description: A Fully-featured shopping platform with Django and React, supporting user authentication, cart, and product management.

title: Live Desktop Transcription
description: A real-time audio transcription application leveraging WebRTC and open-source speech-to-text STT models.
